text: Ara tara yadi ta'orata, injila o tadera rabera kacha theke tadera prati ya nayila hayeche ta pratisthita karata [1], tahale tara abasya'i tadera upara theke o payera nica theke aharadi labha karata [2]. Tadera madhye ekadala rayeche yara madhyapanthi ebam tadera adhikansa ya kare ta kata'i na nikrsta
